message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game quickly.
You were too generous, now it's my turn to be greedy!
Let's find a balance. I'll give you a decent share, but don't expect me to be too generous.
You're still being too soft on me. I want more!
You're being greedy, now it's my turn to be firm. Take it or leave it.
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. I'll take the rest!
This is my final offer. Take it, or we'll both walk away with nothing.
You're bluffing, but I'll call your bluff. This is my final offer!
